value.name: Design
value.description:
Defintion of Done for the In Progress column:

For App Dev Team
-------------------
      1. Prototype approved by stakeholders
      2. User stories submitted
      3. Time and effort estimation completed

Please be sure that all of these are **complete** before moving something into the *Done* section of the In Progress column. Please refer to the [Team Wiki](http://devopsconferences.visualstudio.com/wiki) site for more details

value.name: Develop & Test
value.description:
Defintion of Done for the In Progress column:
             1. All unit test written
             2. Tested by someone other than yourself
             3. Upgrade scripts written and tested
Please be sure that all of these are **complete** before moving something into the *Done* section of the In Progress column. Please refer to the [Team Wiki](http://devopsconferences.visualstudio.com/wiki) site for more details
